professional_summary: Veteran with 9 years of service in the United States Army, currently in flight school for the Army. Possess strong teamwork skills and a passion for flying. Experienced in aircraft maintenance, database administration, and video conferencing management.

key_responsibilities: Managed and maintained Tandberg and Polycom conferencing systems.
Scheduled conferences for the state of Arkansas and communicated with personnel at the Pentagon and other states.
Performed first-tier troubleshooting and device maintenance.
Performed preventive maintenance and troubleshooting on UH-60 aircraft.
Conducted routine inspections to ensure aircraft airworthiness.
Maintained aircraft records and forms for documentation.
Led a team of three to four employees to meet business goals.
Resolved customer issues and developed problem-solving skills.
Managed and maintained SQL Server databases for UH-60 helicopters.
Modified and deleted database entries as required.
Learned to fly Bell 206 and UH-60 Blackhawk helicopters.
Completed instruments training and will obtain a private pilot's license with an instrument rating.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Network and Communications Management
